long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
Global Market Information provides an easy solution to research global companies and contacts, through its Global Digital Intelligence platform. 

Target the right people, companies, find contacts & leads - profit from faster, more informed decisions.

Who We Are:
Global Market Information (GMI) is a powerhouse for business research and intelligence. We use research expertise and cutting-edge technology to deliver actionable insights that trigger growth for companies around the world. In simple words, we empower our clients worldwide with actionable insights to grow their businesses. Our offering includes a perfect mix of human intelligence and domain expertise and a unique range of SaaS technology platforms.

Companies & Employees:
Search through 60M company profiles, 600 million-plus decision-makers, employees, Jobs, events, insights and more.  

Global stock exchanges: 
Research global stock market companies, 15,000 + stocks across multiple exchanges. Financial data for every need, data that goes up to 30 years back in history. Earnings calendar, financial statements, multiple exchanges and more!

Marketing Intelligence:
Search through SEO marketing suite, PPC analyser, Historic data, Competitive analysis, Backlink outreach, Unlimited keyword & domain projects and more..

Reports database 
Research the relevant industry insights and reports all in one place
Privacy Disclaimer and Permissions: 
To provide our services we access data usage and collection, For more information, please see our privacy policy: https://globalmarketinformation.com/privacy-policy
